about_the_game:
Hulltown is an open world adventure RPG packed with mystery, humor, fantasy, and charm!

Welcome to Hulltown, a seaside village with an uncanny allure for mythological creatures - and a rather big problem. Too many of these creatures running rampant, you may ask? Nay, too few. Yes, that's right, you've washed up on the beach of a community where mythological creatures are the main course on the locals menu!

But alas, Hulltown is going through quite a grim season of change. Fewer of these creatures, these Mythos, has meant many an empty belly. The Council has begun to tighten their ever strict control over all things edible.

So, now that you are here, what is it that you will do with yourself?

  • Create your own character! Be who you want to be with a customized character with whom you can choose how to play, what to wear, where to live, and how you'll make your way in Hulltown!

  • Enlist as a Poker and help the townsfolk investigate their Mythos shortage! While normally the Pokers of Hulltown investigate the chaos these creatures sow about town there is a whole new problem. The locals rely on Mythos for food and less and less have been appearing. A mystery is waiting to be unraveled by those with cunning and a sharp eye for clues!

  • Become a Bronzetooth, one of the skilled Mythos chefs! There is a lot to learn when it comes to cooking Mythos but if you've got the patience to learn from the masters perhaps you could rise in the ranks and become a master chef utilizing generations of closely guarded techniques to feed the hungry townsfolk.

  • Study to become a Silvertooth, a healer that uses the very parts of the creatures that harm the poor townsfolk to save them! Besides being a great source of food there are many features of the local Mythos that given to the right hands, can be used for healing, potion making, and more!

  • Join the fight as a Goldtooth, become a legendary warrior, a heroic slayer of Mythos! Earn the awe and respect of the people of Hulltown by vanquishing these deadly beasts and building your valor and fame!

  • Smuggle food and drink in Hulltown's Underground Markets! Why should the Council make all the money? Horde all the food? Keep an eye on all the booze? Perhaps there is a way for you to make a tidy profit, you just need to meet the right people!

  • Buy your very own Home! Everyone needs a place to live! You can't bum off the goodwill of the Council for long. You'll need to earn enough shekels to get your very own place and furnish it to suit your surely exquisite taste!

  • Enlist Companions to help you in your Adventures! There are many friends to be made in Hulltown and perhaps you could convince one or two to join you on your journey! The gods know you may need an extra sword or two!

  • Explore the Open World of Hulltown! There is no one here to hold your hand as you make your way in this new world you've found yourself in! You're on your own and free to explore as you please, but don't come crawling back to me if you've found yourself in a den of vicious Bunyips ready to stomp you to pieces!

short_description: Welcome to Hulltown, where mythological creatures are hunted for food, but alas their numbers are dwindling. You've washed up here & must forge your own path. Will you investigate the Mythos, become a chef, healer, warrior, or smuggler? Explore the eerie streets & uncover Hulltown's dark secrets.
